org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugins.stub.internal

Class FlowProgrammerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugins.stub.internal.FlowProgrammerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPluginInFlowProgrammerService

    public class FlowProgrammerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPluginInFlowProgrammerService
    Represents the openflow plugin component in charge of programming the flows the flow programming and relay them to functional modules above SAL.
